english.segment1: I've got something to talk about. I've had a lot on my mind. But I think I finally figured out. What I'm feeling on the inside. 'Cause where I wanna be. Is in the thick of things. It's all I'm thinking about
english.segment2: CHORUS. These are exciting times. I can see that You are leading me. And it feels so right. I'm assured of this, my offering. I'm finally living. 'Cause these are exciting times
english.segment3: Things can happen so rapidly. Then again, they can take a lot of time. But I know these things are not up to me. But I'll be ready in the mean time. Opportunity is calling out to me. I lay it all on the line
english.segment5: This thing is bigger than me. And I'm just wanting to be a part of. Anything and everything You ask of me
english.segment6: These are exciting times.. I can see that You are leading me
